author: bsunanda
body:
Required to use finer eta/phi segmentation of HCAL as demanded in PhaseII. It is backward compatible with all existing data. It passes the short matrix tests and also single pion scans. Showing some comparison with bare 7_6_0_pre5 and with the changes (referred to as 7_6_0_pre8 in the figures:  simulation and RecHit 
![rechitstask_emean_vs_ieta_eh](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5033146/10030564/dc1b094c-613d-11e5-809e-097d83a15208.gif)
level.
![simhitstask_emean_vs_ieta_h](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5033146/10030538/bdd252f6-613d-11e5-8acf-49c44f220f19.gif)

Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11427 (original by @bsunanda).
title: Run2-hcx29 Expand Hcal DetId
